text:
Hey Kieran!
Thanks for asking. I need it for the creation of a timeline event template. Do you know by any chance how to create it without app id?
You can't create app extensions with private apps unfortunately
you will need to add the properties you want returned into a query param.  multiple properties can be comma separated
if you have a long list of properties you want to return, i would suggest the search endpoint
Can anybody tell me why I would be receiving a 403 Forbidden response when trying to Patch certain products? Some i'm allowed to - and others I'm not.

what are you patching exactly?  oauth or hapi?
i dont have an immediate answer, but maybe if you add some more details someone will see something :grin:
